DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study measure effect patient cost-sharing initiation adjunctive treatment subsequent healthcare utilization expenditures among population commercially insured adult antidepressant therapy .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Patient Cost-Sharing Antidepressant Adjunctive Therapy Use
DOC.criteria: Adult patient ( aged 1864 ) select MarketScan Commercial Database January 1 , 2004 , September 30 , 2008 , least two medical claim diagnosis depression least one prescription fill antidepressant medication . Patients claim diagnosis dementia , schizophrenia , delusional disorder , psychosis , pervasive development disorder , mental retardation , cerebral degeneration , Parkinson 's disease , senility , manic depression , bipolar disorder , major depressive disorder psychotic symptom .
